title: Introducing Else Statements
content: When a condition for an if statement is true, the block of code followinf it is executed, What about if the condition is false? Normally nothing would happen. With an else statement, an alternative block of code can be executed.
The ogical or operator is composed of two symbols(||).

exercises.instruction: Combine the if statements into a single if/else statement.

hint: You should only have one if statement in the editor.
You should use an else statement
testElse(4) should return the string '5 or Smaller'
testElse(5) should return the string '5 or Smaller'
testElse(6) should return the string 'Bigger than 5'
testElse(10) should return the string 'Bigger than 5'
